meanings.definition: The state or quality of being creaky.
meanings.sent1: The old wooden floor's creakiness made it difficult to sneak around quietly.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the creakiness of the door as it opened slowly.
meanings.sent3: The creakiness of the stairs sounded like a chorus of tiny mice singing.
meanings.sent4: The creakiness of the ship's hull hinted at its long history at sea.
meanings.sent5: The creakiness of the rocking chair was a constant reminder of its age.

meanings.sent1: The eerie creakiness in the attic sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent2: The creakiness of the old gate echoed through the silent night.
meanings.sent3: The creakiness of the floorboards seemed to have a secret language of its own.
meanings.sent4: The creakiness of the tree branches in the wind sounded like a ghostly whisper.
meanings.sent5: The creakiness of the rusty swing set added a spooky atmosphere to the playground.
